EmailTemplate.subject: You've Got 2New Mobile Pay Features
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Two new features are now available with Aloha Mobile Pay Aloha Stored Value Payment Option Guests can now apply your branded Aloha Stored Value gift cards as a payment option in Mobile Pay – to pay the full bill, split it or use multiple gift cards. Text2Pay Need a way to easily and securely take payment for call-in orders? Now you can. Enter the guest’s phone number in Aloha and a text is sent to your guest’s phone with a link to pay their bill, saving time for your guests – and you. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
